title: SwipeableCards
summary: A Simple and Beautiful swipe-able card deck & toolbar tab library.
developerAddress: Sree, Plot Number 24 East, PTP Nagar East, Trivandrum, Kerala - 695038
description: GitHub:: https://github.com/GadgetCheck/TinderViewThis app is a demo for my github project where i have created a simple and beautiful swipe-able card deck & toolbar tabs.This is heavily based on AndroidSwipeableCardStack, wenchaojiang has written the library very well but i faced a lot of difficulty integrating it & that's the reason i built this app so that you dont waste time. Use this repo as a base for your app & build on top :).API 19 and UP.I you like work, follow me on twitter for more update and I want you guys to send me pull requests on github if you are able to contribute to my development. Also you are free to use my project in your projects but do give me mention in the licence page.
descriptionHTML:
GitHub:: https://github.com/GadgetCheck/TinderView

This app is a demo for my github project where i have created a simple and beautiful swipe-able card deck & toolbar tabs.

This is heavily based on AndroidSwipeableCardStack, wenchaojiang has written the library very well but i faced a lot of difficulty integrating it & that's the reason i built this app so that you dont waste time. Use this repo as a base for your app & build on top :).

API 19 and UP.

I you like work, follow me on twitter for more update and I want you guys to send me pull requests on github if you are able to contribute to my development.

Also you are free to use my project in your projects but do give me mention in the licence page.
comments: there is no swipe up for super like..üòè
